titleStmt.title: Buckminster 1595 an almanacke and prognostication for the yeare of Christes incarnation, one thousand, fiue hundred, fourscore, and fifteene, and the thirde after the leape yeere, and the yeere of the worldes creation 5557 : seruing generally for all Englande, but especially for the meridian of this honorable citie of London / gathered and made by Thomas Buckminster.
titleStmt.author: Buckminster, Thomas, ca. 1531-1599?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Watkins and Iames Robertes,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
